parameters:
How are the results of my research? ...Well, I guess it's
needless to ask, right?

It's a fan letter from fans. It seems that there are also
dedicated fans among the creators themselves.

It seems to be a very difficult research paper. It appears to
have received considerable recognition from the public opinion.

It looks like a high-class doll. The clothes are meticulously
made, even on the inside. I wonder if it's meant for that kind of
purpose.

events.name: ◇初回のみイベントマス帰還

parameters: \SE[5]Should we go back to the Yuri scene...? \!

events.name: ◆ふたなりを求めて　シーンあり

parameters: 論文を読んでるルナロア。
隣に研究者。遠まきからラウラヴィタ

...I think it's very wonderful. It will probably become a
realized technology.

Alright...!! To receive a stamp of approval from that Lunaroa,
it's a researcher's honor...!!

We just need to overcome a few more issues... right? Is it
alright if I see the raw materials?

Those red fruits outside. I want to see Vita- chan's body, so
feel free to look as much as you like.
スライドスピード = def
...Ah, is this the one where I... get undressed?
ヴィタの体を見ながら会話。

It's really attached, huh... Right now it's small, but can it
become bigger?

Nn... Maybe, I can do it... Can you watch me for a bit? When I'm
being watched... I become bigger...

By the way, I've been meaning to ask. Luna... um, is Lunaroa a
famous person?

Famous person... you mean that Lunaroa, right? She is one of the
few special scholarship students in the history of the magic
academy, who has been holding the top position in the academy for
five years straight, even while yawning...

She has even published books that challenge existing principles
and has obtained seven doctoral degrees... but it feels like I
haven't heard this directly from her?
I don't really know much about Luna's school...

It seems like there were various things going on over there...
Well, it's not really appropriate for an outsider like me to talk
so freely.

You're Luna's lover, right? I'm sure she'll tell you about it
eventually.

Yeah, that's right... By the way, how did they find out about our
relationship too?

Ahaha...! Just by looking at your eyes, I can tell that much.
Sigh... Being young is nice, huh...

Welcome back. ...So, how was it? Does it seem like it'll work
out?

I could see the logic behind it. I think it's probably...
possible.

...Alright! Go ahead and rest in bed. I won't be sleeping
tonight.

If there's anything I can help with, please let me know. Whether
it's making tea or being a guinea pig, I'll do anything!

Hehe... Then, will you stay by my side? If you're there with a
smile, I feel like I can do anything.
Supporting each other in love... Ahh... That's nice.

It seems like their life skills are in a disastrous state. The
carrots on the cutting board are completely dried up...
